```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(furrr)
library(readxl)
```



```{r}
prison <- read.csv(file = "./data/california_jail_survey_1995_2020_csv/california_jail_county_monthly_1995_2020.csv")
head(prison)

county <- read.csv(file = "./data/County_-_Revenues.csv")
head(county)

onlyrev <- county %>% group_by(Fiscal.Year,Entity.Name) %>% summarise(overall = sum(Values))

seventeenrev <- onlyrev %>% filter(Fiscal.Year == 2017)

seventeenpri <- prison %>% filter(year == 2017)

seventeenpri %>% group_by(fips_county_code) %>% summarise_at(vars(avg_daily_pop_sentenced_male,avg_daily_pop_sentenced_male),.funs = mean)


head(prison)

```
